issues.description: The create-person endpoint is documented as POST /persons in the problem statement, but in the solution the server uses @PutMapping("persons") and the client uses webClient.put() when adding a new Person. This mismatch between POST and PUT will confuse students and breaks the specified API contract.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the create-person endpoint to use POST in both server and client. Change the server annotation to @PostMapping("persons") and in the client use webClient.post() for addPerson(..).
